mapper.insert: insert into notice(noti_num, noti_title, noti_content, noti_date, noti_readcount, noti_image, noti_image1, noti_image2) values(#{notiNum},#{notiTitle},#{notiContent},#{notiDate},#{notiReadcount},#{notiImage},#{notiImage1},#{notiImage2})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from notice where 1=1
and noti_title like concat('%',#{search},'%')
mapper.update: update notice set noti_readcount=noti_readcount+1 where noti_num=#{notiNum}
